name: Slot Mania
description:
Slot Mania is a slot machine style game when you spin the wheel and each of the 3 marks lands on a random image, if they all line up, you win the bonus!

---Controls---

Click Spin to spin the wheel

---Credits---

Game Made By: Scott Zimmerman (2021)

Music Licensed By: Scott Cawthon

This game was made using Scratch!
